trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] drawing.
trans-unit.target: 抽象類別，描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]繪圖。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承，您的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are light-weight objects that enable you to add geometric shapes, images, text, and media to an application.
trans-unit.target: 繪圖物件是輕量級物件，可讓您應用程式中加入幾何形狀、 影像、 文字與媒體。

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are considered light-weight because they do not provide support for [Layout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and focus.
trans-unit.target: 繪圖物件會被視為輕量級，因為它們不提供支援[配置](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和焦點。

trans-unit.source: Because of their performance benefits, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art.
trans-unit.target: 因為其效能優勢，繪圖十分適用於背景或美工圖案。

trans-unit.source: You also use drawings when programming at the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> level.
trans-unit.target: 在設計程式時也使用繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>層級。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Because they inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, Drawing objects provide additional features that make them useful for describing clip art and backgrounds: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 因為它們是繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別，繪圖物件提供額外的功能，使它們分別適合用來描述美工圖案和背景︰ 可以宣告為共用多個物件，變成唯讀的並進行安全執行緒。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: There are different types of Drawing objects for different types of content: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.
trans-unit.target: 有不同類型的不同類型的內容的繪圖物件︰ <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A Drawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 可凍結功能繪圖是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得軸對齊界限的繪圖內容。

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: 軸對齊界限的繪圖內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
